comments.content: Richard Lipton's [Bickham Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804042112/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm) using ome stylistic alternates: / [C](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804042112/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/511753/780), / [A](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804042112/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/511753/778)...
